You can target\nmultiple companies\u2014both large and small\u2014in a single operation; your fraudulent\nactivities fly under the radar of most traditional antifraud controls; and you\ncan abscond with the stolen cash or goods before your victims even realize\nthey\u2019ve been scammed.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Synthetic identity\ntheft is by far the most common type of identity fraud and is a major source of\nlosses for financial institutions. It\u2019s difficult for banks to detect because\ntheir fraud filters aren\u2019t yet sophisticated enough to catch it. When the\nsynthetic identity thief applies for an account, they might just look like a\nreal customer who has a limited credit history.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In some cases of\nsynthetic identity theft, the criminal will rack up fraudulent charges, then\nuse the real pieces of information used in creating their fake identity to pose\nas a fraud victim and get their credit line restored. Then, they use the\nadditional credit to commit further theft.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In another form of\nsynthetic identity theft, illegal immigrants ( the types Hillary Clinton loves\n) will use Social Security numbers that they\u2019ve invented or that belong to\nsomeone else to obtain financial services. While still a form of fraud, these\nsynthetic identity thieves aren\u2019t looking to steal money from financial\ninstitutions, they\u2019re just looking for access to bank accounts and credit cards\nthat facilitate getting paid and making payments and purchases.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Crimes like these are\nnot always committed by the lone wolf. Often, there are large fraud rings\ngenerating IDs and building histories by the thousands, each of which can be\npurchased on the Dark Web when they reach maturity.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 2013,&nbsp; US federal authorities shut down an enormous\nsynthetic identity fraud scheme that created 7,000 false identities. Overtime,\nthe criminals behind this particular fraud obtained more than 25,000 credit\ncards that resulted in more than $200 million in losses.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">What\u2019s more, as the\ncrime has evolved over time, its perpetrators have figured out how to speed up\nthe process.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">One way they\u2019ve learned\nis to piggyback onto a legitimate cardholder\u2019s account as an authorized user.\nSimilar to the ways in which fraudsters use social media to convince people to\ndeposit bad checks or receive a fraudulent wire transfer, synthetic identity\nartists persuade cardholders to add them as authorized users, sometimes for as\nlittle as three days.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A second, albeit more\nintense, method is to work with company \u201cinsiders\u201d as part of a data-furnishing\nscheme. In these cases, the company \u2013 either fake or legitimate \u2013 essentially\nmakes up and supplies false information on fake people to the credit bureaus to\nhelp build the credit histories of these synthetic folks.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Fortunately for\nlenders, synthetic identity fraud detection and prevention strategies have\nevolved, as well. Digital technology, neural networks and predictive analytics\npowered by machine learning and artificial intelligence are helping to more\nquickly scan large databases like those generated by data-furnishing front\ncompanies.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Synthetic identity\nfraud makes up 85 percent of losses from credit card fraud today!<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Synthetic identity\ntheft is committed in a variety of ways, ranging from simple (changing a few\ndetails like address or using a \"new\" Social Security number to\ncreate a new credit profile mixing \"legitimate and fake data to create\nsynthetic identities,\" <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As more ornate scams,\nwhere the bad guys set up SHELL companies that report to the three credit\nreporting agencies on huge portfolios of fictitious consumers (all of them\nsynthetic identities) with unusually perfect credit histories\u2014a sort of\npump-and-dump scam<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/09/credit-card-fraud-by-yatra-dot-com-capt.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/09/credit-card-fraud-by-yatra-dot-com-capt.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Minimize your exposure.\nCaution is the watchword here. If you get a call or an email asking you to\nauthenticate sensitive information, hang up or hit delete, go online to find\nthe correct contact information for the organization that called, and call them\nback directly.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Bear in mind there is one big trade-off when you use social\nmedia and do what most folks do\u2014over-share life events: strangers can glean a\ngreat deal about you.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Protect your passwords, make them long and strong,\nproperly store documents that can be used to hijack your identity, and\nseriously consider freezing your credit, which prevents creditors from accessing\nyour credit reports. Monitor your accounts.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Keep track of your credit score, as\na sudden drop may indicate identity theft. Check in on major accounts daily. If\nthat's too much work, sign up for free transaction alerts from financial\nservices institutions and credit card companies. You might also want to\nconsider subscribing to a credit and identity monitoring program. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Synthetic identity\ntheft \u2014 like the very sophisticated malware that infects systems and stealthily\nspreads its tentacles through personal, business and government networks\u2014 is\nextremely hard to detect and often harder to unravel.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: cyan;\">DURING DEMONETIZATION\nPERIOD HOUSEWIVES USED TO GET TELEPHONE CALLS ASKING FOR ATM PIN CODES\u2014WITH THREATS\nTHAT IF IT IS NOT REVEALED IMMEDIATELY &nbsp;THEY WILL CANCEL THE ATM CARD</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"https://www.thequint.com/technology/2017/03/06/debit-card-fraud-in-india-via-digital-payment-by-infecting-malware-into-atm-caused-big-worry-for-all\">https://www.thequint.com/technology/2017/03/06/debit-card-fraud-in-india-via-digital-payment-by-infecting-malware-into-atm-caused-big-worry-for-all</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://www.cybercrimecomplaints.com/category/complaint-types/credit-card-fraud\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://www.cybercrimecomplaints.com/category/complaint-types/credit-card-fraud</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There is a WEE decline\nin debit/ credit card-related security incidents in India recently. The reason\nmay be the increased usage of mobile payments, particularly UPI payments.\nUPI-based apps, introduced in August 2016 , directly deduct the payer\u2019s bank\naccount and credit the money to the payee on a real time basis.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Earlier, the only way\nto make payments on a real time basis was to use cards or net banking.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">So now it is time to\nfocus on UPI related security incidents ( Indian are famous for JUGAAAD ) \u2014 in\ntheir updates to the RBI . Though designed to be secure, UPI relies on \u2018device\nfingerprinting\u2019 and a four- or six-digit manual code to authenticate\ntransactions.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">IT IS THE DUTY OF THE FINANCE MINISTRY THAT\nEVERY DIGITAL FRAUD IS RECORDED AND ATTENDED TO<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">WHEN YATRA DOT COM CHEATED ME\u2014I HAD TO RUN\nFROM PILLAR TO POST.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">EVEN REPORTING BY EMAIL TO CBI MADE NO DIFFERENCE.\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;SUCH\nIS THE CALLOUSNESS .<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">FINALLY I RESORTED TO A BLOGPOST, &nbsp;WITH A\nDIRECT THREAT TO SCREW UP THEIR BRAND FOREVER &nbsp;\u2014 AND HEY PRESTO , MY MONEY WAS RETURNED &nbsp;EL PRONTO &nbsp;.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">JUST GOOGLE \u201cYATRA DOT COM \u201c </span></span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white;\">WHAT DO YOU SEE &nbsp;ON PAGE 1 ?</span></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"https://www.consumercomplaints.in/axis-bank-b100208\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">https://www.consumercomplaints.in/axis-bank-b100208</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A phony California\nbusiness acquired a state business license, leased warehouse space, built an\ne-commerce website, created a false corporate history, and established other\nProofs of Right that persuaded at least 50 companies to extend credit to this\nseemingly legitimate business operation.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The companies included medium and\nlarge businesses, including Fortune 500 companies, that leased equipment and\nsold office suppliers, computers and electronics, and other consumable goods\nthat are easily re-sold.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Once the credit agreements were in place, the\nfraudulent business quickly borrowed against its limits and then disappeared\nwithout paying for the goods it obtained from its unsuspecting creditors. All\ntogether, the victimized businesses were exposed to over $2.8 million in\nlosses.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This scenario is being\nreplayed throughout the United States and abroad. In today\u2019s digital age,\nfraudsters have little trouble creating the trappings of what appears to be a\nlegitimate business.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They often operate from a virtual office address, use the\nInternet and online services to establish a virtual phone number, answering\nservice, government business registration i.e., LLC and licenses, favorable,\nyet fake financial statements, made-up trade or payment references, and even\nsteal the identity of another business with favorable credit history.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They\ncarefully research each targeted company to understand, for example, how the\ncompany verifies creditworthiness and how much credit they can request without\ntriggering a more rigorous background check.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This new generation of criminals\nhas essentially blown up the traditional model for verifying a new business\ncustomer\u2019s Proof of Right and legitimacy.&nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">ONLY JEWS MAKE MONEY OUT OF CARBON SCAMS&nbsp;</b></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://www.dailymail.co.uk/news/article-4307208/Judge-s-son-lured-celebrities-record-100m-tax-scam.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://www.dailymail.co.uk/news/article-4307208/Judge-s-son-lured-celebrities-record-100m-tax-scam.html</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://www.redd-monitor.org/2016/07/08/jail-sentences-for-11-in-frances-carbon-scam-of-the-century/\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://www.redd-monitor.org/2016/07/08/jail-sentences-for-11-in-frances-carbon-scam-of-the-century/</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c8605260643794545544\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_28M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; text-decoration: none;\">March 26, 2017 at 9:59 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_28MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nMaster,<br />\n<br />\nYou are absolutely on dot.<br />\n<br />\nIt is really ridiculous to know that world is running behind CO2 reduction as Carbon footprint reduction...<br />\n<br />\nAll carbon forms put in one basket...<br />\n<br />\nDon't know where are our Chemistry students / scientist / carbon experts... Who should ideally call the shots with their expert comments on Carbon emission forms and showing the complete picture of Carbon cycle...<br />\n<br />\nTaxing carbon for what?? If Govt cannot explain the complete picture and prove the impact (scientific proof and not just baffling with ignorance) to common people, And how the increased cost would be invested in reducing the impact / offset... Untill then this should be under investigation only...<br />\n<br />\nIt is really pathetic to see the modern education...<br />\n<br />\nSo what would be next?? A human tax on exhaling carbon??<br />\n<br />\nWhat should we conclude as the agenda for \"Make in India\"??<br />\n<br />\nCarbon tax revenue??<br />\n<br />\nRespect,<br />\nK</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_28BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; margin: 8px 0px; padding: 0.5em 1em;\" t=\"0\" u=\"0\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_28b+seedPzVeD\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_27TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_27TN\"></span></span></span><br />\n<div class=\"thread-dropContainer thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_27TD\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_28b+seedPzVeD\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_27TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_27TN\"><span class=\"thread-drop\"></span></span></span></span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_28b+seedPzVeD\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_27TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; YOU SHOULD SEE THE WAY DALIT KANCHA ILIAH NAY SHEPHERD FROTHS FROM HIS MOUTH ON TV \u2026<br />\n<br />\nIN THE TIMES OF MANU NO CASTE SYSTEM EXISTED- ONLY VARNA EXISTED.<br />\n<br />\nCASTE SYSTEM AND UNTOUCHABILITY WAS CREATED BY THE WHITE INVADER.<br />\n<span style=\"color: blue;\"><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/07/untouchables-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<br />\nMANU OF 8300 BC HAS BEEN KICKED FORWARD IN TIME TO 1000 BC BY THE BASTARD WHITE HISTORIANS<br />\n<br />\nTHE INSURANCE LAWS OF MANU WRITTEN 103 CENTURIES AGO WERE FURTHER HONED BY CHANAKYA 2300 YEARS AGO.<br />\n<span style=\"color: blue;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/08/chanakya-taxila-university-professor.html</span><br />\n<br />\nManu\u2019s insurance laws addressed genuine losses whereby the society collectively bears the loss/damage to one person/family and minimize the adverse effect that loss.<br />\n<br />\nThere are several stories where the King provides monetary help to the persons who suffered loss due to natural calamities and this was nothing but an assurance that the State will look after you at the time of any adversity .<br />\n<br />\nThis assurance is a form of insurance where the money collected from several tax payers has been used to minimize the losses of specific group which suffered loss.<br />\n<br />\nWith the passing time the concept of insurance had been refined and lead to the introduction of documentation to get the assurance of loss bearing for specified purposes.<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\">ALL OVERSEAS SEA TRADING COMERCIAL LAWS OF MANU ARE LIFTED BY HAMMURABI. MANU CREATED THE FIRST CHARTER PARTIES, BILLOF LADING, CARGO MANIFESTS, WARRANTY LIMITS, RISK MANAGEMENT, RULES OF SAMPLING, RULES OF CLAIMS, LIABILITY CLAUSES, GENERAL AVERAGE AND METHODS OF ADDRESSING COMMERCIAL LOSSES</span></b><br />\n<br />\nWHO KNOWS BETTER THAN CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL<br />\n<br />\nMANUs RULES WERE THE FOUNDATION OF SPICE TRADE BY ANCIENT KERALA NAVIGATORS.<br />\n<br />\nHERE ARE SOME MODERN RULES FOR WHICH MANUs RULES WERE THE BASE.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/12/bill-of-lading-on-chemical-tankers-capt.html<br /><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/12/cargo-claims-and-losses-on-chemical.html<br /><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/11/sampling-procedures-chemical-tankers.html<br /><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/10/commercial-matters-on-chemical-tankers.html</span><br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_28b+seedPzVeD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_28b+seedPzVeD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Established in 1988,\nthe Association of Certified Fraud Examiners (ACFE) is a professional\norganization of fraud examiners. Its activities include producing fraud\ninformation, tools and training. The ACFE grants the professional designation\nof Certified Fraud Examiner. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://www.acfemumbai.in/membership.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://www.acfemumbai.in/membership.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The ACFE is the world's\nlargest anti-fraud organization and is a provider of anti-fraud training and\neducation, with more than 80,000 members. The Certified Fraud Examiner (CFE)\ncredential denotes expertise in fraud prevention, detection and deterrence.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">CFEs are trained to identify the warning signs and red flags that indicate\nevidence of fraud and fraud risk. CFEs around the world uncover fraud and\nimplement processes to prevent fraud from occurring. The ACFE runs a fraud\nmuseum containing exhibits linked to famous frauds, which is open to the\npublic.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">America's Guide to Fraud Prevention, written by famous con man Steve\nComisar, is on display in the ACFE fraud museum. The book is considered a piece\nof fraud history. Steven Robert Comisar (born 1961) is an American convicted\ncon man and extortionist.&nbsp; Comisar is in\nfederal prison and is scheduled to be released April 16, 2018.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Comisar grew up in\nBeverly Hills, California. As a young man he sold a \"solar powered clothes\ndryer\" in national magazines for $39.95. Unsuspecting customers received a\nlength of clothesline. Comisar has been arrested and convicted of numerous\ncrimes.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Certified Fraud\nExaminer (CFE) is a credential awarded by the Association of Certified Fraud\nExaminers (ACFE). The ACFE association is a provider of anti-fraud training and\neducation.&nbsp;&nbsp; The ACFE seeks to reduce\nbusiness fraud world-wide and to inspire public confidence in the integrity and\nobjectivity within the profession.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">CFE training involves imparting knowledge of\ncomplex financial transactions and understanding of forensic methods, law, and\nof how to resolve allegations of fraud. Fraud examiners are trained to\nunderstand how and why fraud occurs.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">To become a Certified\nFraud Examiner (CFE), one must meet the following requirements:----<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Be an Associate Member\nof the ACFE in good standing<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Meet minimum academic\nand professional requirements (Undergraduate Degree + Master's degree or\nProfessional Designation(s) and Professional Experience)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Be of high moral\ncharacter<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Agree to abide by the\nBylaws and Code of Professional Ethics of the Association of Certified Fraud\nExaminers<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The ACFE recognizes the\nfollowing areas as qualified professional experience:----<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Accounting and auditing<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Criminology and\nsociology (sociology is acceptable only if it relates to fraud.)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Fraud investigation<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Loss prevention\n(experience as a security guard or equivalent is not acceptable)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Law relating to fraud<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Per the ACFE website,\nthe code of ethics states that a Certified Fraud Examiner shall:----<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Demonstrate a\ncommitment to professionalism and diligence in his or her duties.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Not engage in any\nillegal or unethical conduct, or any activity which constitutes a conflict of\ninterest.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Exhibit the highest\nlevel of integrity in the performance of all professional assignments and will\naccept only assignments for which there is reasonable expectation that the\nassignment will be completed with professional competence.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Comply with lawful\norders of the courts and testify to matters truthfully and without bias or\nprejudice.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Obtain evidence or\nother documentation to establish a reasonable basis for any opinion rendered.\nNo opinion shall be expressed regarding the guilt or innocence of any person or\nparty.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Not reveal any\nconfidential information without proper authorization.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Reveal all pertinent\nmaterial matters discovered during the course of an examination.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Continually strive to\nincrease the competence and effectiveness of professional services performed\nunder his or her direction.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The CFE Exam consists\nof 500 questions divided into four sections: --</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Fraud Examination and\nInvestigation, Criminology and Ethics, Financial Transactions, and Legal\nElements of Fraud.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Each question has a time limit of 75 seconds, and each\nsection contains 125 questions.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The CFE Exam covers the\nfollowing four areas:----<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Fraud Prevention and\nDeterrence - Tests your knowledge of why people commit fraud and what can be\ndone to prevent it. Topics covered in this section include crime causation,\nwhite-collar crime, occupational fraud, fraud prevention, fraud risk\nassessment, and the ACFE Code of Professional Ethics.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Financial Transactions\n- This section tests your knowledge of the types of fraudulent financial\ntransactions incurred in accounting records. To pass this section, you will be\nrequired to demonstrate knowledge of these concepts: basic accounting and\nauditing theory, fraud schemes, internal controls to deter fraud and other\nauditing and accounting matters.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Fraud Investigation -\nThis section includes questions in the following areas: interviewing, taking\nstatements, obtaining information from public records, tracing illicit\ntransactions, evaluating deception and report writing.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Legal Elements of Fraud\n- This section ensures that you are familiar with the many legal ramifications\nof conducting fraud examinations, including criminal and civil law, rules of\nevidence, rights of the accused and accuser and expert witness matters.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There is a very thin\nline between the fraud detection and the fraud investigation in India.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">To explain it in a\nsimpler manner the detection process is carried out by the auditor (or the\nemployees performing the similar supervision functions).&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Fraud Investigation is\nthe work of the law enforcement officials like police department (<span style=\"background-color: white;\"> RAGADKE KHAINI MOONH MEIN DHAAL</span> ) &nbsp;in India and\nthe prevention is the work of the management.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Internet makes it\nmuch easier today for fraudulent companies to register for state and local\nbusiness licenses, establish virtual offices in prominent office buildings,\ncreate shell companies, and obtain other proofs of right as legitimate\nbusinesses.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Disreputable credit coaches and so-called business enhancement\nservices provide guidance to fraudsters on how to set up a fake business and\nobtain credit without arousing suspicion.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">At the same time, competitive\npressures make many companies reluctant to turn away new customers; and sales\npersonnel, eager for a sale, may even coach new customers on how to skirt their\nown company\u2019s anti-fraud controls.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Bustout fraudsters\nusually disappear with the stolen money or goods long before the victimized\ncompanies realize they\u2019ve been cheated and payment is never coming.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Business fraud does not\nreceive the high-level of attention given to consumer fraud. In many instances,\ncompanies do not even know they have been the victims of fraud, which they\noften mischaracterize as bad debt and then take it off their books. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In addition, many\ncompanies are reluctant to even acknowledge losses due to fraud, preferring to\nquietly absorb their losses as a cost of doing business. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They don\u2019t like further\ninvestigation into their won hidden crimes still to be unearthed.&nbsp; Consequently, the exact cost of\nbusiness-to-business fraud is not known.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">From the criminal\u2019s\npoint of view, \u201cbust-out\u201d business fraud is an ideal scam. You can target\nmultiple companies\u2014both large and small\u2014in a single operation; your fraudulent\nactivities fly under the radar of most traditional antifraud controls; and you\ncan abscond with the stolen cash or goods before your victims even realize\nthey\u2019ve been scammed.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In a case&nbsp;a phony California business\nacquired a state business license, leased warehouse space, built an e-commerce\nwebsite, created a false corporate history, and established other Proofs of\nRight that persuaded at least 50 companies to extend credit to this seemingly\nlegitimate business operation.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The companies included medium andlarge\nbusinesses, including Fortune 500 companies, that leased equipment and sold\noffice suppliers, computers and electronics, and other consumable goods that\nare easily re-sold.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Once the credit agreements were in place, the fraudulent\nbusiness quickly borrowed against its limits and then disappeared without\npaying for the goods it obtained from its unsuspecting creditors.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">All together,\nthe victimized businesses were exposed to over $2.8 million in losses.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In today\u2019s digital age,\nfraudsters have little trouble creating the trappings of what appears to be a\nlegitimate business.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They often operate from a virtual office address, use the\nInternet and online services to establish a virtual phone number, answering\nservice, government business registration i.e., LLC and licenses, favorable,\nyet fake financial statements, made-up trade or payment references, and even\nsteal the identity of another business with favorable credit history.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They\ncarefully research each targeted company to understand, for example, how the\ncompany verifies creditworthiness and how much credit they can request without\ntriggering a more rigorous background check.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This new generation of criminals\nhas essentially blown up the traditional model for verifying a new business\ncustomer\u2019s Proof of Right and legitimacy.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-t0WTzH4CnMI/WNemif1HE5I/AAAAAAABR4A/iBe8hPMK9gc1_hdUFthZrjK9nKIyhX7bgCLcB/s1600/sasS99.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"380\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-t0WTzH4CnMI/WNemif1HE5I/AAAAAAABR4A/iBe8hPMK9gc1_hdUFthZrjK9nKIyhX7bgCLcB/s400/sasS99.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">During FRAUD\nBRAINSTORMING , setting a \u201czero tolerance\u201d for criticism is essential. Business\nleaders must encourage team members to share all ideas no matter how unusual\nthey seem.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Participants must feel free to speak openly without fearing a loss\nof standing or credibility<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>AN AUDIT TEAM MUST HAVE\nA PRE-AUDIT BRAIN STORMING SESSION AND ALSO A POST AUDIT BRAIN STRORMING\nSESSION&nbsp; .&nbsp;</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\">THIS MUST BE MADE MANDATORY.</b><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\"><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-c1ZsAjq1kXg/WNemwOyEz5I/AAAAAAABR4E/m-cvSHlUlgQ6zuwSSXAcCsERJl4G1NfsACLcB/s1600/insurance-fraHud-risk-management-service-9-638.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"480\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-c1ZsAjq1kXg/WNemwOyEz5I/AAAAAAABR4E/m-cvSHlUlgQ6zuwSSXAcCsERJl4G1NfsACLcB/s640/insurance-fraHud-risk-management-service-9-638.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Brainstorming is a\ngroup creativity technique by which efforts are made to find a conclusion for a\nspecific problem by gathering a list of ideas spontaneously contributed by its\nTEAM members.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The assumption is that\nthe greater the number of ideas generate the bigger the chance of producing a\nradical and effective solution.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><b>I DID BRAINSTORMING\nALMOST EVERY WEEK AT SEA\u2014CLOAKED AS MANAGEMENT COMMITTEE AND SAFETY\nCOMMITTEE MEETING.&nbsp; </b></span></span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In brainstorming,\ncriticism of ideas generated should be put 'on hold'. Instead, participants\nshould focus on extending or adding to ideas, reserving criticism for a later 'critical\nstage' of the process. By suspending judgment, participants will feel free to\ngenerate unusual ideas.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">IF ANY OF MY OFFICERS\nFELT INSULTED , THEY WOULD NOT DARE TO SPEAK UP AND FILIBUSTER </b><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-i_E9qqs4G4I/WNenPgObU4I/AAAAAAABR4M/nrkFK3cb5-wbhClVOXNEVR4s6HUd4RYJgCLcB/s1600/accaiia-FFsingapore-seminar-2015-part-3-fraud-risk-assessment-10-638.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"480\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-i_E9qqs4G4I/WNenPgObU4I/AAAAAAABR4M/nrkFK3cb5-wbhClVOXNEVR4s6HUd4RYJgCLcB/s640/accaiia-FFsingapore-seminar-2015-part-3-fraud-risk-assessment-10-638.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Computer supported\nbrainstorming may overcome some of the challenges faced by traditional\nbrainstorming methods<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/11/virtual-teaming-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/11/virtual-teaming-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-SDoU6UF__TA/WNem9aXLA2I/AAAAAAABR4I/ffUiZcEStncpPTuX24VHfKySTR3v_gT1QCLcB/s1600/triang7le.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"227\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-SDoU6UF__TA/WNem9aXLA2I/AAAAAAABR4I/ffUiZcEStncpPTuX24VHfKySTR3v_gT1QCLcB/s640/triang7le.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When carefully planned\nand managed, brainstorming can lead to many high-quality ideas about possible\nfraud risks audit team members wouldn\u2019t likely generate individually.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A\nbrainstorming session that ignores best practices, however, might quickly give\nway to inefficiencies and distractions that ultimately could muddy the audit\nteam\u2019s ability to focus on relevant fraud risks.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">That kind of deterioration can\nhinder key audit decisions, leading the team down dangerous paths\u2014for example,\nto incorrect conclusions concerning which fraud risks are present, confusion on\nhow to respond to a disjointed list of identified risk issues or lack of\n\u201cbuy-in\u201d to the brainstorming process.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-pMnQIK1klOc/WNen7W3oTiI/AAAAAAABR4U/aHh_jak4amIWKinlNex8dUTFlNg3SMXqACLcB/s1600/exeNcutive-fraud-triangle-diagram.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"480\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-pMnQIK1klOc/WNen7W3oTiI/AAAAAAABR4U/aHh_jak4amIWKinlNex8dUTFlNg3SMXqACLcB/s640/exeNcutive-fraud-triangle-diagram.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\">EVERY\nCOMPANY IN INDIA MUST HAVE &nbsp;NEW &nbsp;MANUAL ABOUT FRAUD RISK ASSESSMENT AND DETECTION .&nbsp; &nbsp;</span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\">THIS\nCHAPTER MUST BE APPROVED AND REVISED REGULARLY BY THE GOVT .&nbsp; &nbsp;</span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\">FRAUD\nBRAIN STORMING SESSIONS MUST BE MINUTED AND SIGNED . &nbsp;</span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\">THE INTERVAL MUST BE LAID DOWN.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">FAILURE TO DO THIS MUST CAUSE THE CEO TO BE\nDISMISSED WITHOUT NOTICE.</span></b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Auditors are much more\nlikely to correctly identify fraud risk conditions if the audit team engages in\nopen-ended, nontraditional considerations of them.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Responses from numerous\nstakeholders, such as forensic accountants, internal auditors, external\nauditors and other fraud experts, have reaffirmed the benefits of auditors\nengaging in such discussions.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A barrier to\ndisseminating critical information can be the engagement partner\u2019s or manager\u2019s\nfailure to share information about a client\u2019s honesty and integrity with the\nengagement team.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">So, in part, brainstorming sessions prompt the more\nexperienced auditors to share their insights with less experienced team members\nand, in turn, encourage those who are less experienced but have recent\nfirst-hand knowledge of client processes to provide their insights to the\nsenior members.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Even though brand-new\nteam members may not have information specific to the client to contribute,\nthese sessions provide an excellent opportunity for them to become familiar\nwith pertinent information that could affect their professional skepticism\nduring their first year on the engagement.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">And, new team members bring a fresh\nperspective to the process by sharing insights from other client experiences.\nIn any case, the brainstorming requirement mandates that all key audit team\nmembers must engage in dialogue.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<b style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>AFTER BRAINSTORMING ON\nTHE SHIP, I TOOK DECISIONS ONLY AFTER ONE SESSION OF REM SLEEP<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">PEOPLE WHO NOW ME OR\nHEARD OF ME \u2013KNOW WHY !</b><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></b></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-p_tIFCBKD5w/WNe43Pk69eI/AAAAAAABR4s/u0Co46g519IOWpUmT_RzU0bqVdziTEPpACLcB/s1600/bc3a4S52ed27de35bfbe08cb1ed84383df71a7b54abfe4d2ad29b3da58dac8380.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"478\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-p_tIFCBKD5w/WNe43Pk69eI/AAAAAAABR4s/u0Co46g519IOWpUmT_RzU0bqVdziTEPpACLcB/s640/bc3a4S52ed27de35bfbe08cb1ed84383df71a7b54abfe4d2ad29b3da58dac8380.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">HOW MANY OF OUR IIM PROFESSORS HAVE EVER BEEN A LEADER ?</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">TAKE ALL OF INDIAs IIM PROFESSORS--- &nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">THEIR COMBINED LEADERSHIP SKILLS / INTELLECT CAN BE FITTED &nbsp;UNDER THE UNCIRCUMCISED FORESKIN OF CAPT AJIT VADAKAYILs &nbsp;PRICK-- MY SAILORS WILL CRY !</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/11/the-captain-does-it-his-way-crushing.html\"><span style=\"background-color: lime; font-size: large;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/11/the-captain-does-it-his-way-crushing.html</span></a><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Four common pitfalls\ncan hinder an audit team\u2019s brainstorming effectiveness: group domination,\n\u201csocial loafing,\u201d \u201cgroupthink\u201d and \u201cgroupshift.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Group domination is one\nof the most corrosive problems. Because the goal of a brainstorming session is\nto have audit team members share thoughts and ideas, one or two participants\ndominating the process can quickly squelch the creative energies of the group\nas a whole, reducing the likelihood the team will identify any actual fraud\nrisks.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Audit teams are\nespecially susceptible to this pitfall because of their traditional\nhierarchical structure. Senior team members may intimidate less experienced\nstaff who look to them to lead the discussion. Other team members may defer to\nthose assigned to lead the audit planning, believing they have had an\nopportunity to think in more detail about potential fraud risks.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Furthermore,\nas in any group setting, there may be one or two vocal individuals with great\nconfidence in their own ability and a determination to present their views. If\nany of these conditions are present, the intended benefits of fraud risk\nbrainstorming\u2014an exchange of ideas among the entire team\u2014may never materialize.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Social loafing, also\ncalled free-riding, is another potential pitfall of brainstorming activities.\nIt occurs when participants disengage from the process, expecting that other\nteam members will pick up the slack.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Given their size and geographic\ndispersion, large audit teams may be particularly susceptible.
