, &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Financial Action\nTask Force (FATF), an inter-governmental body of which India&nbsp; is a member, sets international standards on\ncombating money laundering and terrorist financing.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It requires member\njurisdictions to adopt measures to prevent the misuse of legal persons for\nmoney laundering and terrorist financing and to ensure that there is adequate,\naccurate and timely information on the beneficial ownership and control of\nlegal persons that can be obtained in a timely fashion by competent\nauthorities.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The FATF defines \u201cbeneficial owner\u201d as a natural person who\nultimately has a controlling ownership interest in a legal person, or who\nexercises control of the legal person through other means.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The FATF require\nstates, among other things, to:--</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Implement relevant\ninternational conventions<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Criminalise money\nlaundering and enable authorities to confiscate the proceeds of money\nlaundering<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Implement customer due\ndiligence (e.g., identity verification), record keeping and suspicious\ntransaction reporting requirements for financial institutions and designated\nnon-financial businesses and professions<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Establish a financial\nintelligence unit to receive and disseminate suspicious transaction reports,\nand<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Cooperate\ninternationally in investigating and prosecuting money laundering<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime;\"><a href=\"http://www.fatf-gafi.org/media/fatf/documents/reports/Guidance-transparency-beneficial-ownership.pdf\">http://www.fatf-gafi.org/media/fatf/documents/reports/Guidance-transparency-beneficial-ownership.pdf</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 2018, as a member of\nthe FATF,&nbsp; India will undergo a mutual\nevaluation conducted by other member jurisdictions regarding its efforts to\ncombat money laundering and terrorist financing. Hence the need to implement a\nstatutory regime on the transparency of beneficial ownership of companies\nbefore such evaluation, to ensure that Hong Kong\u2019s overall rating is not\nadversely affected.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In India a government\ntask force on action against shell companies has decided to prosecute about 10\nlakh such firms and prepare an Aadhaar-based KYC registry to check future black\nmoney generation through them.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On 1 February, 2017, India's Finance Minister\nArun Jaitley introduced the Finance Bill, 2017 (the \"Bill\"). The Bill\nadds the concept of \"beneficial owner\" to the Customs Act, 1962,\nstating that \"beneficial owner means any person on whose behalf the goods\nare being imported or exported or who exercises effective control over the\ngoods being imported or exported\".&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">RAJYA SABHA MEMBERS BLOCK BILLS TO GIVE\nTHEMSELVES ENOUGH TIME TO SIPHON OFF THEIR KICKBACK MONEY.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">RAJYA SABHA DOES NOT\nHAVE THE POWERS TO BLOCK FINANCE BILLS.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: cyan;\">NOBODY KNOWS THE RULES.. IT IS A CRYING SHAME TO WATCH RAJYA SABHA\nPROCEEDINGS</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Finance Bill\nintroduced the concept of \"beneficial owner\" to subsection (3A)\nsection 2 of Customs Act, 1962, stating that \"beneficial owner means any\nperson on whose behalf the goods are being imported or exported or who\nexercises effective control over the goods being imported or exported\".<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Further, subsections\n(20) and (26) of section 2 (i.e. definitions of exporter and importer\nrespectively) have been amended accordingly to replace the words \"any\nowner\", with words \"any owner, beneficial owner\".<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Bill amends the\ndefinitions of \"importer\" and \"exporter\" to include\n\"beneficial owner\". These changes will be effective upon the passing\nof the Bill through Parliament and MUST&nbsp;\nhappen in early April 2017.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime;\"><a href=\"https://www.mayerbrown.com/files/Publication/69b28fa3-fe03-4eed-8d8f-15814030e52c/Presentation/PublicationAttachment/73e6e6c8-e3cc-4921-bb7a-1fb8608d81fa/170214-MBC-TradeAlert-IndiaCustoms.pdf\">https://www.mayerbrown.com/files/Publication/69b28fa3-fe03-4eed-8d8f-15814030e52c/Presentation/PublicationAttachment/73e6e6c8-e3cc-4921-bb7a-1fb8608d81fa/170214-MBC-TradeAlert-IndiaCustoms.pdf</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Again, \u201c beneficial\nowner\u201d is the individual owner who ultimately owns or controls the interest in\nshares or a customer, on whose behalf the transaction is being conducted. It\nincludes those who exercise ultimate effective control over a legal person or\narrangement.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Unless a concerted effort is made to pin down clients\u2019 beneficial\nownership details and give regulators powers to acquire assets compulsorily in\ncircumstances where the information is found to be incorrect or fraudulent,\nthen extensive money laundering in offshore jurisdictions will continue.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">It is\ncrucial banks improve the collection of information when onboarding clients,\nand this will help to promote greater integrity and transparency throughout the\nfinancial system. Banks are used internationally to clean and reinvest the\nproceeds of organised crime.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is often done by\nestablishing false identities for directors to hold accounts and operate sham\nbusinesses such as dry cleaners, bars, restaurants or other retail outlets.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">WE ASK\u2014</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: purple;\">WHY DID\nCOLLEGIUM JUDGES BURN MIDNIGHT OIL TO OPEN CHAMIYA BEER BARS IN MUMBAI WITH\nJUDICIAL AND OFFICIAL SANCTION ?<o:p></o:p></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: purple;\">TO HELP A COUPLE OF\nDOZEN GOOD LOOKING WHORES&nbsp; ( MASQUERADING\nAS DANCERS ) \u2013 WHEN THEY CAN GET A DECENT JOB ANYHERE&nbsp; WITH THEIR LOOKS AND FIGURE ?<o:p></o:p></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: purple;\">THESE COLLEGIUM JUDGES\nWERE DROOLING OUT OF HAJAAR COMPASSION AND HAJAAAR PEEPTA?</span></b></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: purple;\">OH FUCKIN' YEAH ?<o:p></o:p></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">WE KNOW WHY&nbsp; !</span></b><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-ME4JfE29UxE/WM5vo4tVeuI/AAAAAAABRwU/wXB4Oep_x7U0ldEb2hFkuRLmZKCDVjlVQCLcB/s1600/NEWS4xx914.gif\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-ME4JfE29UxE/WM5vo4tVeuI/AAAAAAABRwU/wXB4Oep_x7U0ldEb2hFkuRLmZKCDVjlVQCLcB/s1600/NEWS4xx914.gif\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The control in shell\ncompanies can be limited by shares, and any party bearing shares, such as\nshareholders or board of directors could qualify as having the ultimate\ncontrol. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Although a single\ncorporation has a relatively straightforward structure, by adding alternative\ntypes of corporate vehicles complexity is increased, which can be problematic.\nFor instance, trusts cannot be owned and control is not transparent. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In support of this,\ncompliance officers suggest that all standard parties to the trust such as the\ntrustee, the settlor and the beneficiary have a role to play and should be\ninvestigated. The main point is that the BO can be found by identifying parties\nwho exercise ultimate effective control over a legal matter. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">According to the FATF\nmethodology (2006), this involves identifying individuals who have a\ncontrolling interest and actively participate in management. Hence, ownership\nis only relevant when control can be inferred from it. The assumption that ownership\nis a proxy for control should be further analyzed.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">External parties\n(without legal title) have the ability to exercise control given that they have\ncontractual rights, convertible securities or financial derivatives. Hence, not\nonly parties with sizeable shares and voting rights have control over a\ncorporation.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Consequently, if a web\nof shell corporations and complex offshore structures are concealing a legal\nperson that has committed fraud, this does not guarantee that the actual BO\nwill be found. Assuming that the legal person is in fact a multinational\ncompany, publicly available information displays who has the ultimate effective\ncontrol, such as shareholders, board of directors, etc. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This suggests that the\nBO of the company is not necessarily the individual involved in a fraudulent\nactivity&nbsp; Hence, it could be that a\nlower-ranked individual within the company is the only one in control of the\nbusiness relation referred to as the ultimate solicitor. The aforementioned\nshows that the strategy to investigate the natural person who committed fraud\nis costly and time-consuming. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">focus should lie on\nfinding the parties exercising the ultimate effective control over a corporate\nvehicle or the assets within the entity. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In order to determine\nthe likelihood of fraud to occur, risk factors or events known as \u201cred flags\u201d\nare generally analyzed. Prior researches have used \u201cred flags\u201d to create logit\nmodels to predict the likelihood of fraudulent activities <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The use of shell\ncorporations creates means for the opportunity aspect since their anonymous\nnature produces risk factors. In other words, the utilization of complex\noffshore structures provides opportunities of specific authorized parties to\nengage in fraudulent accounting reporting.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Tax inversion, or corporate\ninversion, is the practice of relocating a corporation's legal domicile to a\nlower-tax nation, or tax haven, usually while retaining its material operations\nin its higher-tax country of origin<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The intended tax\nsavings of the Pfizer (US)\u2013Allergan (Ireland) merger were estimated at $160\nbillion since US taxes can be 35% while Irish taxes are 12.5% at most. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2016-04-06/pfizer-allergan-plan-to-mutually-end-merger-cnbc-reports\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2016-04-06/pfizer-allergan-plan-to-mutually-end-merger-cnbc-reports</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The practice became\ncommon only in the late 1990s, with U.S. corporations seeking to relocate to\ntax havens such as Bermuda<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Tax inversions are a\nform of tax avoidance, whereby corporations and individuals arrange their\naffairs to legally reduce their tax obligations <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A corporate inversion,\nas defined by the U.S. Treasury, occurs when a U.S.-based multinational\ncorporation restructures itself so that the U.S. parent is replaced by a\nforeign parent and the original U.S. company becomes a subsidiary of the\nforeign parent.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/Dr-Reddys-in-350-million-deal-to-buy-eight-US-drugs-from-Teva-Allergan/articleshow/52704080.cms\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/Dr-Reddys-in-350-million-deal-to-buy-eight-US-drugs-from-Teva-Allergan/articleshow/52704080.cms</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Unlike the law of most\nother developed nations, the U.S. Internal Revenue Code imposes income tax on\nthe profits of American corporations' foreign subsidiaries. This creates a\nstrong incentive for American companies with large overseas markets to seek to\nrecharacterize themselves as a foreign corporation..&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Although inverting\ncompanies are colloquially said to \"change\" their domicile to a\nforeign country, technically inversion usually involves creating a new parent\ncompany that sits \"on top\" of the corporate structure and is\nincorporated in the desired foreign jurisdiction. The legacy U.S. corporation\nretains its domicile and becomes a mere subsidiary.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Since the profits of\nsubsidiaries of U.S. corporations are typically subject to tax, a U.S. company\nthat establishes a new foreign parent typically seeks to shift as much of its\nprofits as possible out from under the legacy U.S. corporation, so that profits\ncan be delivered directly to the ultimate foreign parent company without\npassing through a U.S. entity. Importantly, corporate inversions do not by\nthemselves require a change in the location of the actual corporate\nheadquarters.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In about 70 percent of inversions out of the U.S., the chief\nexecutive officer remained in the U.S. Confusingly, many inverted companies\nclaim \"headquarters\" in the new foreign jurisdiction even though all\ntheir most senior officers remain in the U.S. To complicate things further,\ncompanies seeking to establish tax residency in certain jurisdictions, such as\nIreland and the UK, may have reason to claim their \"principal executive\noffices\" are in those locations.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This can typically be achieved by holding\na majority of board meetings in these jurisdictions, and does not require the\nsenior executives to actually work at these locations. Corporate inversions are\na tax loophole ..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As long as MNCs\nconclude that &nbsp;US taxes&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">are higher than in\nother nations, inversions will continue in the future.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A U.S. company with a\nforeign subsidiary becomes a foreign company with a U.S. subsidiary.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Donald trump\nunderstands why US companies are leaving .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">US Many executives\nargue that taxes in nations like the US are already too high and that firms\nsuffer a competitive disadvantage if higher taxes mean less after-tax income is\nreinvested in R&amp;D and/or smaller dividends are distributed to shareholders<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The U.S. has the\nhighest tax rate on businesses in the developed world.&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;US &nbsp;corporate tax rate (including states) is 39.1\npercent.&nbsp; Flow-through firms face an even\nhigher rate, approaching 50 percent depending on their state. If you want to\nreverse this trend, there's only one way to really do it--lower the tax rate\nthat businesses pay.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hillary Clinton\ncriticized Donald Trump\u2019s proposal to reduce the corporate income tax rate.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hillary would oppose\nany effort to lower the corporate income tax rate because \u201cthe U.S. has been\ndoing pretty well when it comes to competitiveness.\" This position puts\nHillary far to the left, far outside the mainstream of economic thought.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Clinton\u2019s refusal to\nacknowledge and address America\u2019s high business tax rates would ensure that\nAmerica\u2019s competitiveness problem remains unresolved.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hillary does NOT know\nthat more than 53 American businesses left USA through an inversion in the past\ndecade.. America has also lost an additional 190 billion USD &nbsp;billion worth of assets through acquisitions\nby foreign competitors<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">While the Trump tax\nplan called for across the board business tax reductions, the Clinton plan\nwould only make the tax code more complex and burdensome for American\nbusinesses.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">HILLARY CLINTON IS A\nPEA BRAINED WOMAN WHO CAME THIS FAR BY HOLDING ON TO BILL CLINTONs LANGOT</span></b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-size: large;\">Hillary Clinton did NOT\nknow asshole from elbow about US economics.&nbsp;\nUSA is lucky that this old wicked criminal hag has been put out to\npasture</span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-Jbuz3frk1j8/WM6Gz4EejHI/AAAAAAABRwo/0NmrbxtQXRAiPz_JgSV8aP3LjZce047ewCLcB/s1600/c639320eb0d177c53680c551b1bf43de68.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"426\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-Jbuz3frk1j8/WM6Gz4EejHI/AAAAAAABRwo/0NmrbxtQXRAiPz_JgSV8aP3LjZce047ewCLcB/s640/c639320eb0d177c53680c551b1bf43de68.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Lowering business taxes\nto a globally competitive rate will allow US &nbsp;businesses to compete against foreign\ncompetitors and put a stop to corporate inversions and foreign acquisitions of\nAmerican assets.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Trump tax plan\ncalls for lowering the tax rate for all businesses to 15 percent. A rate\nreduction is desperately needed. The current corporate income tax rate is too\nhigh.</span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\">THIS POST IS NOW CONTINUED TO PART 21 , BELOW-</span></b><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: lime;\"><br /></span>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/03/shell-companies-for-money-laundering_20.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/03/shell-companies-for-money-laundering_20.html</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-7mI4v80Sn3c/WM11RADsXgI/AAAAAAABRvs/ad8yeLM5IQcqEZdhr2Ov-YiM5oL8p8x2ACLcB/s1600/IMG-20170316-WA0002%2B%25283%2529.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-7mI4v80Sn3c/WM11RADsXgI/AAAAAAABRvs/ad8yeLM5IQcqEZdhr2Ov-YiM5oL8p8x2ACLcB/s640/IMG-20170316-WA0002%2B%25283%2529.jpg\" width=\"428\" /></a></div>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<br />\nCAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL<br />\n..<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br /></div>\n", "author": {"id": "14410812789424637654", "displayName": "Capt. Ajit Vadakayil", "url": "https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654", "image": {"url": "//4.bp.blogspot.com/-QSnd-Z8F7Kc/XFtPudWdwlI/AAAAAAABfq4/vxrkFOO7Iu8Mf6-OaPgw6FPpRDSmMgLdgCK4BGAYYCw/s35/capt%25252BajitC%25252Bvadakayil.JPG"}}, "replies": {"totalItems": "100", "selfLink": "https://www.googleapis.com/blogger/v3/blogs/3564735312144269387/posts/373665362241082017/comments"}}, {"kind": "blogger#post", "id": "235755439429074747", "blog": {"id": "3564735312144269387"}, "published": "2017-03-18T00:51:00+05:30", "updated": "2017-03-19T20:46:23+05:30", "etag": "\"iHf3yWDE_geBgZ8U7rgZ_xuTeAQ/dGltZXN0YW1wOiAxNDg5OTM2NTgzNTM3Cm9mZnNldDogMTk4MDAwMDAK\"", "url": "http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/03/shell-companies-for-money-laundering_18.html", "selfLink": "https://www.googleapis.com/blogger/v3/blogs/3564735312144269387/posts/235755439429074747", "title": "SHELL COMPANIES for money laundering, tax evasion, hiding kickbacks, layering PART 19 -- CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL", "content": "<div dir=\"ltr\" style=\"text-align: left;\" trbidi=\"on\">\n<br />\n<br />\n\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>THIS POST IS CONTINUED FROM PART 20, BELOW--</b></span><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/03/shell-companies-for-money-laundering_17.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/03/shell-companies-for-money-laundering_17.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Mexican money brokers\nmove cash overtly as a routine part of their business.&nbsp; Much of the money smuggled into Mexico and\nthen brought back into the United States for deposit is believed to be\nreported, as required, to U.S. Customs and Border Protection on CMIR forms\n(Currency and Monetary Instrument Report)&nbsp;\nupon entry into the United States.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">However, discrepancies\nbetween reporting on CMIRs and subsequent CTR filings by U.S. banks, whenthe\ncash is deposited, indicate that cash brought from Mexico is being comingled\nwith additional cash already in the United States before being deposited.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">One\nmethod money launderers use to create theimpression that large currency\ndeposits consist of legitimate funds is to show financial institution employees\na completed CMIR form.&nbsp;&nbsp; But the CMIR,\nwhether or not legitimate, is irrelevant to whether atransaction should be\nconsidered suspicious.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Panama Papers are\nshining light on the hidden world of money laundering, providing important\ndetails on how overseas shell corporations are used to make dirty money look clean.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The money laundering process\nis staggeringly complex, the scope is large and operations are limited only by\nthe launderer'simagination.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The release of the\nPanama Papers shines a light on dirty money overseas.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;Mossack Fonseca, the Panamanian law firm that\nis the source of the Panama Papers, is just one firm in a single country. It\nhas spent the past 40 years creating shell companies<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;In the placement stage, \"dirty\"\nmoney is deposited into a legitimate financial institution such as a bank or a\nbrokerage firm. Next the money is \"layered\" by wiring it to accounts\nowned by shell companies, with transactions taking place over a period of time.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Because these companies are based in countries with weak or nonexistent\ndisclosure rules, the original money becomes impossible to trace.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">At the\nintegration stage (&nbsp; JNU Commie Kanhaiya\nKumar will say INTEGRASSANN ) , the money reenters the mainstream economy through\nlegitimate-looking transactions such as an investment in a local business or\nthe purchase of goods at highly inflated prices from a company owned by the launderer.\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A LOT OF FDI IN INDIA\nIS KICKBACKS RECEIVED BY CORRUPT INDIAN POLITICIANS \u2013LOOPED BACK USING A WHITE\nSKINNED MAN <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A US race and his\npartners seemed to be making far more money than seemed plausible. The feds\ncouldn't pinpoint the problem until they arrested a major drug dealer who was placing\nlarge bets at the track.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The managing partner,\nfearful of a full-fledged investigation, avoided prosecution by explaining how\nthe racetrack earned its seemingly outsize profits. Using the track's\npari-mutuel betting operations, the owners had been able to provide patrons\nwith large kickbacks.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In pari-mutuel operations, bettors bet against each other\ninstead of the track, and a portion of all bets is given to the house. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Parimutuel betting (\nFrench: Pari Mutuel or mutual betting) is a betting system in which all bets of\na particular type are placed together in a pool; taxes and the\n\"house-take\" or \"vigorish\" are removed, and payoff odds are\ncalculated by sharing the pool among all winning bets.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In some countries it is\nknown as the Tote after the totalisator, which calculates and displays bets\nalready made.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The parimutuel system is used in gambling on horse racing,\ngreyhound racing, jai alai, and all sporting events of relatively short\nduration in which participants finish in a ranked order. A modified parimutuel\nsystem is also used in some lottery games.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Two months ago, the US Internal Revenue Service&nbsp; announced new rules for withholding and\nreporting of pari-mutuel winnings as well as games such as slots, keno and\nbingo.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The changes promote\ngreater compliance and more accurate reporting and withholding by taxpayers,\nbut also reduce burdensome and needless paperwork system-wide.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Welfare recipients in\nUSA have been&nbsp; using their electronic\nbenefit transfer (EBT) cards to purchase, among other things, alcohol and\ntobacco, and also used the funds to gamble.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Millions of&nbsp; US welfare funds are spent at casinos.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In Texas has no regulations\non how one\u2019s welfare money is spent\u2014you can spend it in a whorehouse</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Regardless, the US federal\ngovernment seized the track in a civil forfeiture proceeding because the drug\ndealer had used it to launder his money.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Many money laundering\nstories seem to involve innocuous transactions such as buying racehorses, yachts\nor condominiums, all of which seem far removed from the corporate world.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">But\ncompanies need to realize that there are lots of ways that money launderers can\npenetrate even buttoned-up corporate environments, whether through the computer\nparts supplier, the real estate company from which it leases offices or the\ngolf club where executives mingle.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">One scheme that became\nthe focus of a congressional investigation was known as the \"Toys For\nDrugs Black Market Peso Exchange Scheme.\" The owners of Los Angeles-based\ntoy wholesaler Woody Toys Inc. received millions in cash payments from\nColombian drug traffickers through small deposits into its bank accounts.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The company used these\ndeposits to buy toys from manufacturers in China, and the toys were shipped to\nColombia. The proceeds from toy sales in Colombia were then used to pay back\nthe drug traffickers.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Moreover, the US\nfederal government doesn't need a high level of proof to charge a company with conspiracy\nand seize goods. All that's required is probable cause.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The company then has a\nshort time to challenge the seizure. This kind of seizure is one reason that\nbig pharma companies have adopted their own anti-money laundering protocols.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Take the case of Arthur\nBudovsky, who was recently sentenced to 20 years in prison after pleading\nguilty to running a money laundering operation.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">His virtual currency company\nLiberty Reserve allowed users to register and transfer money by supplying only\na name, email address and birth date. It operated much like bitcoin trading\nsites.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">According to the U.S. Department of Justice, Liberty acted as a\n\"shadow banking system\" for criminals, and the government seized its\nassets.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Operation Universal\nMoney Fast in 2009 targeted a large, sophisticated fraud against Medicare and\nprivate insurance companies in the southeastern United States.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The perpetrators\nof the fraud opened shell companies and phantom clinics across Florida, Georgia,\nLouisiana, North Carolina, and South Carolina. The clinics were empty store\nfronts; some were nothing more than a post office box.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">No patients were ever\nseen or treated and no doctors worked there, yet tens of millions of dollars in\nbogus claims related primarily to HIV infusion therapy were submitted to\nMedicare and private insurers. The criminals used stolen identities and paid\nfor the complicity of some physicians to lend an air of legitimacy to the\nfraud.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">To conceal their\nidentities, the criminals registered the bogus businesses in the names of\nnominee owners. They also opened their own check-cashing store, Universal Money\nFast, to launder more than $50 million in benefits paid by Medicare and private\ninsurers.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 2007, in Washington,\nD.C., a woman was charged under the organized crime statute &nbsp;for operating a multimillion dollar\nprostitution ring across several states and laundering the proceeds through\nmoney orders, banks, real estate, and securities investments.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The defendant,\nwho lived in California, allegedly owned and managed Pamela Martin and\nAssociates, which advertised as an escort service.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The business managed the\nappointments for the employees who allegedly were instructed to keep a portion\nof the cash they earned and use the rest to buy money orders which were mailed\nto the defendant.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">According to the indictment, the defendant deposited the\nmoney orders in bank accounts in California and subsequently drew on the\naccounts to buy real estate and fund several brokerage accounts.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Although used legitimately\nfor relatively small value transactions, money orders present a money\nlaundering risk due to the opportunity to conduct anonymous transactions below\nthe federal recordkeeping threshold. The risk is magnified by structuring.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Frequently reported suspicious activity is\nminimal gaming, characterized by a customer buying chips or depositing funds\ninto an account with the casino and then cashing out after little or no play.\nThis may be indicative of money laundering, especially at casinos that allow a\ncustomer to exchange cash for a casino check or wire transfer.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 2011, in Maryland USA a man and woman who\nmanaged a multimillion dollar heroin ring in the Baltimore area were indicted\non drug trafficking and money laundering charges. The heroin was purchased from\nsuppliers in New York and brought to the Baltimore area for retail sale. The couple\nallegedly used drug cash for gambling in Las Vegas casinos and bought lottery\ntickets from winners.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The couple allegedly conspired with a used car dealer, paying\nthe dealer with drug cash in exchange for checks written on the dealership\u2019s\nbank account. The couple also created two limited liability companies that held\ntitle to eight properties.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The money laundering\nmethods identified in the NMLRA exploit one or more of the following vulnerabilities:--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u2022 Use of cash and\nmonetary instruments in amounts under regulatory recordkeeping and reportingthresholds<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u2022 Opening bank and\nbrokerage accounts in the names of businesses and nominees to disguise the<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">identity of the\nindividuals who control the accounts<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u2022 Deficient compliance\nwith AML regulations<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u2022 Merchants and\nfinancial institutions wittingly facilitating illicit activity<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">FinCEN, the U.S.\nfinancial intelligence unit (FIU), has an international training program that\nfocuses on providing training and technical assistance to a broad spectrum of\nforeign government officials, financial regulators, law enforcement personnel,\nand bankers.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This training covers a wide variety of topics, including money\nlaundering typologies, the creation and operation of FIUs, assistance in the\nestablishment of comprehensive anti-money laundering regimes, computer systems\narchitecture and operations, and assessments of country-specific money\nlaundering regimes and regulations.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">FinCEN also works closely with the Egmont\nGroup of FIUs to provide training and technical assistance to various\njurisdictions for establishing and operating their own FIUs.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Smart cards, generally\nissued by non-banking financial service providers such as large brokerage\nhouses, operate completely outside of any U.S. government regulations. This\nlack of regulatory oversight creates vulnerability as no record is created or\nmaintained on the transfer of data.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In theory, financial information and\nmonetary funds can be accessed, manipulated, and transferred to or from an\naccount, or from card to card, with no \"footprint\" being made.\nSystems that support this industry can move billions of dollars a day through\ncomputer networks that often are not regulated or controlled by any government\nentity.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Skimming is the\nunauthorized capture and replication of data from a person's credit card\nthrough the use of a small, hand-held device, which can later be used to\ndownload the information for illicit purposes.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The ease and speed with which\ninformation can be gathered and used for illegal purposes in a skimming\noperation represents a threat to financial institutions around the world.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The\nSecret Service has trained foreign law enforcement officials about the type of\nequipment, manner of operation, and distribution methods for the information\ntaken from unsuspecting credit card holders. Industry sources have estimated\nthat skimming outside of the United States alone affects approximately one\nhundred seventy five different businesses per week.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This large number of\ncompromised points of sale has the potential to cause many millions of dollars\nin fraud losses.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A mutual legal\nassistance treaty (MLAT) is an agreement between two or more countries for the\npurpose of gathering and exchanging information in an effort to enforce public\nor criminal laws.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Modern states have\ndeveloped mechanisms for requesting and obtaining evidence for criminal\ninvestigations and prosecutions.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When evidence or other forms of legal\nassistance, such as witness statements or the service of documents, are needed\nfrom a foreign sovereign, states may attempt to cooperate informally through\ntheir respective police agencies or, alternatively, resort to what is typically\nreferred to as requests for \u201cmutual legal assistance.\"</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;The practice of\nmutual legal assistance developed from the comity-based system of letters\nrogatory, though it is now far more common for states to make mutual legal\nassistance requests directly to the designated central authority within each\nstate.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In contemporary practice, such requests may still be made on the basis\nof reciprocity but may also be made pursuant to bilateral and multilateral\ntreaties that obligate countries to provide assistance.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This assistance may\ntake the form of examining and identifying people, places and things, custodial\ntransfers, and providing assistance with the immobilization of the instruments\nof criminal activity.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Mutual Legal Assistance\nTreaties (MLATs) allow generally for the exchange of evidence and information\nin criminal and ancillary matters. In money laundering cases, they can be\nextremely useful as a means of obtaining banking and other financial records\nfrom&nbsp; treaty partners.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The current ability of\nmoney launderers to penetrate virtually any financial system makes every\njurisdiction a potential money laundering center. There is no precise measure\nof vulnerability for any financial system; but a checklist of what drug money\nmanagers reportedly look for provides a basic guide. The checklist includes:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;
